remarks: A lattice element covered by a line is an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lncvrelat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lncvrelat.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lncvrelat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lncvrelat.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
lncvrelat.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
lncvrelatN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ P e. B ) /\ ( ( M ` X ) e. N /\ P C X ) ) -> P e. A ) $.
